videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: I can now attack without fear.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a boros aggro deck, featuring Iroas, God of Victory as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

40:02 - vs Tinybones, Trinket Thief
44:41 - vs Plagon, Lord of the Beach
51:20 - vs Nahiri, Forged in Fury
54:29 - vs Muldrotha, the Gravetide
